document.full_text: the voice of javier sicilia, a poet whose son was killed in a drug-trafficking attack, has put an exclamation point to mexico's campaign against drug cartel violence.
document.title: the saturday profile: violence suffocated a father's poetry, but not his voice
lines_and_colors: the voice of javier sicilia, a poet whose son was killed in a drug-trafficking attack, has put an exclamation point to mexico's campaign against drug cartel violence.
